content.rendered:
Tessa is no longer the innocent creature Hardin knew. He is already able to understand the nature of the emotions boiling in the boy, therefore he is able to keep him under control. However, even Tessa is shocked by what comes out of Hardin as the dark details of his tragic past surface.

Directed By Castille Landon

Written By Sharon Soboil. Anna Todd

Stars: Louise Lombard. Hero Fiennes Tiffin. Josephine Langford
